mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_comment (user_id, post_id, comment, created_id, updated_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postId}, #{comment}, #{createdId}, #{updatedId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.user_id AS comment_user_id, c.post_id AS comment_post_id, c.comment AS comment_content, c.created_date AS comment_created_date, c.created_id AS comment_created_id, c.updated_date AS comment_updated_date, c.updated_id AS comment_updated_id, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_nickname, u.user_email, u.user_img_url, u.created_date AS user_created_date, u.updated_date AS user_updated_date, p.post_id, p.post_content FROM tb_comment c LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_post p ON c.post_id = p.post_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_date ASC

SELECT c.comment_id, c.user_id AS comment_user_id, c.post_id AS comment_post_id, c.comment AS comment_content, c.created_date AS comment_created_date, c.created_id AS comment_created_id, c.updated_date AS comment_updated_date, c.updated_id AS comment_updated_id, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_nickname, u.user_email, u.user_img_url, u.created_date AS user_created_date, u.updated_date AS user_updated_date, p.post_id, p.post_content FROM tb_comment c LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_post p ON c.post_id = p.post_id WHERE c.comment_id = #{commentId}
